website_summaries.verdict: Does a great job cleaning gums and teeth, plus it's easy to take with you when you travel.
pros: Has five pressure settings and a generous water reservoir
Base and reservoir slide together for easy storage and transport
cons: The electric power cord is in an awkward position

customer_reviews.title: I love this Waterpik
customer_reviews.text: I love this Waterpik. However, I cannot give it 5 stars. There are a few design flaws that should be addressed, especially for the price. 1. It really needs some type of lid or cover. I don't like the open design. After all, it sits in a bathroom with all types of bacteria floating around. 2. It's compact size is what draw me to this since I have limited counter space. However, the plug sticks straight out in the back. This requires that it sit almost 2 inches from the wall. That's all most the depth of the item. It would be great if the plug was on the side. The whole point is to save space.
customer_reviews.author: R. Neal

customer_reviews.title: Tries to be portable and powerful, really does neither.
customer_reviews.text: Was excited about this because of the portability and the quality. Very well made, but kind of a dumb concept. It is slightly less small then a normal unit, and considerably less powerful. I suppose it is better then the other travel options, but I found it to be too cumbersome for daily use and too weak to match up against a full size unit. Completely unacceptable that you can’t change the tip.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous user of things

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect new product
customer_reviews.text: This could have been a five star review except that Water Pik decided to use a non changeable tip. The pros for this unit over Water Pik’s other portable rechargeable glosser is that the water reservoir is opened and is easy to clean. The unit is as strong as a regular sized Water Pik. On the down side there is only one tip and so far you can’t even purchase an extra one from Water Pik. I highly recommend based on the water pressure alone.
customer_reviews.author: David Z.

customer_reviews.title: 4 1/2 Stars!
customer_reviews.text: I love this small Waterpik. I have a small bathroom with very limited counter space. This small unit is perfect it takes up very little space but it has the same cleaning power as the larger unit. I am very happy with it. I took off half a star because it doesn’t have a cover for the water reservoir. I do highly recommend for those with limited space or for travel
customer_reviews.author: CopperKat

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent!  Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful choice, especially for people who have trouble with the weight of having the water in the handle of the flosser. The tank makes it much easier to use for folks with arthritis or other difficulties lifting the heavier ones. Took me awhile to find this one, but I _love_ it. Told my dentist about it, and he plans to recommend it to other patients.
customer_reviews.author: MaryMartha

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This little side kick water pik is the right size how ever there are a couple of issues. The plug sticks out so far on the back that it looks bulky in the bathroom. The curled up flosser piece gets soaking wet when flossing as there is no way for it to avoid the water running out of your mouth. It is convenient for travel so that is why I gave it a 4. Also if you break the pik there are no replacement picks you have to buy the entire hose which is 9.95.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Pint Size with Power
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size! It is like having a huge waterpik in a reduced size. I love the amount of water that it holds. The pressure is adjustable and meets the needs. I have had it for 1 week and think it was the perfect purchase. Now, to see how it holds up to the use. I think if you are looking for a compact waterpik this is the one!
customer_reviews.author: RandyK

customer_reviews.title: Really good for travel
customer_reviews.text: I really like this unit. I had the older battery powered portable version they used to make but the tank had to be refilled every 30 seconds. This one is great. It has about a two minute water tank, more flossing power and travels really well. The only thing that would make it better is if it ran on battery power as the short power cable could be a problem in hotels where the outlet is far from the sink.
customer_reviews.author: AbeK

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Poor! Tip cannot be replaced - you must purchase an entire hose with integral tip - dont waste your money on this... very disappointing. Poor design; wasteful!!!
customer_reviews.author: hilary2621

customer_reviews.title: Better than a handheld for travel
customer_reviews.text: I'm obsessed with my full-size Waterpik and needed something compatible for travel. I was searching for a hand-held when I found this. I'm so glad I did! It's so small yet just as strong as my home unit. It's much more attractive, too. I would prefer to use it instead of my larger unit but without a cover for the reservoir, and just can't. You can't just turn it upside down either because the wand hooks onto the rim. Also, as others have mentioned, the charging cord sticks out the back instead of the side or, better yet, the bottom. Waterpik, please hire me as a consultant for your next great item!
customer_reviews.author: Aloha Girl

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by my hygienist for traveling. I initially questioned it over the travel pik that holds the water in the base. She felt the water pressure just wasn't as adjustable or as powerful as this one and once it is packed, takes up the same room, but in a different shape. I was hoping for the black trim but at Amazon's almost $50 difference, I went with the rose trim. Actually, I couldn't be happier. Very easy to set up, use, and it is a spa for my teeth and gums. I won't travel with out it now. Currently on 3 months of traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Sailing RN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I already have another waterpik but I bought this one for travel. The materials are far far far better. The feel of it, everything. The way it’s packed also is awesome. Then as using it performs as good as the other one. It is very compact also. There is absolutely nothing bad. Unless you need other than the standard mouthpiece I recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Waterpik
customer_reviews.text: I have had it approximately 2 weeks and absolutely love it. This Waterpik has been brilliantly engineered to have a small footprint that travels in a self contained way. Most importantly it does the job well for which I purchased it. A traveler’s Waterpik extraordinaire.
customer_reviews.author: D. E. Pitts

customer_reviews.title: Wow. Is a very impressive bit of design.
customer_reviews.text: Pros - unboxing is very premium - the design is really well thought through - the first impression lasts - managed to make it look pretty - works very well, highest setting is strong - really compact - love the way it packs down small - even well designed carry case - high quality Cons - hard to find one, would be great if a little less loud.
customer_reviews.author: G Force

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the exorbitant price tag
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not worth the high price tag. Although the unit is smaller in size the design is terrible. It actually takes up more space due to the spacing of the power cord. Also the entire hand and cord set is replaced instead of just the head when needed. What a waste. I am returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey J.

customer_reviews.title: Almost....
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I have limited space, and the dimensions fit nicely on my sink. Until you plug it in. The plug itself sticks out more than 2” from back of the unit, so it sits that far from the wall. I’m surprised at this, because the design is otherwise well thought out. I took it with me on a recent trip to Hawaii, and really appreciate how compact it becomes. So one star deducted for the cord, otherwise it would be five.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my son. He did not inform me until much later he didn't use after he had a problem with the water pic. It was working too strong and wasn't able to be adjusted. The functions didn't work properly. Dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia T.

customer_reviews.title: bought one March 2018 and have loved the versatility of it EXCEPT
customer_reviews.text: I too, bought one March 2018 and have loved the versatility of it EXCEPT: no cover to keep the reservoir clean, and the tip/handle just started leaking and sprays around the base all over my clothes, mirror, sink, etc. what a mess! I understand there is no replacement tip. After paying over $100 it is to be destined for the garbage heap? Really? Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M.

customer_reviews.title: Compact and contemporary!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this WaterPik because I needed a more compact unit for travel. Boy, does this fit the bill! Outlet plug and water container fit around the base unit, and the flosser tool unsnaps. Small carry case is included. Fully adjustable for water force just like the big boys. Only possible drawback is that it comes with just one flosser head, but you can order additional heads to snap in. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: DA

customer_reviews.title: had for 2 months and so far so good..
customer_reviews.text: had for 2 months and so far so good.....I had 3 of the handheld rechargeable ones and after taking one apart found that any water inside totally shorts them out (found moisture in there) so switched to think and great. Too bad it has to be plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: S. Liput

customer_reviews.title: Cannot change tips
customer_reviews.text: Overall I really like the product. I travel frequently and it is small and portable enough to take with me. My dentist recommended the Sidekick rather than some of the rechargeable models because he said they were not as powerful. The only thing I do not like is that you cannot change out just the tip, you need to change or replace the tip and hose if more than one person uses the device or you need to replace. When I purchased this the "frequently bought together" came up and suggested a Plaque Seeker tip which had brushes on the tip. I ordered one thinking I could replace the standard tip but it does not work with the Sidekick.
customer_reviews.author: HG Tucson

customer_reviews.title: Buy one for everyone in your family.
customer_reviews.text: Loved how easy this is to use. It does not take up a lot of counter space and even if you leave it out it looks good! I have never had a waterpik before and I wish I had this years ago. My teeth feel wonderful and I know they are clean of food and plaque. If you are currently using floss, stop and buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie kelley

customer_reviews.title: small but powerful
customer_reviews.text: poweful, easy to use and lightweighted. if you are fan of waterpik, you are going to love this product. it ia very small but very powerful. it has more power than a cordless product.
customer_reviews.author: sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Well made and very portable
customer_reviews.text: I have used the WaterPik products for as long as I can remember, and the quality is still built in. This unit is very easy to use, and obviously a lot of thought went into the design because it breaks down into a very compact unit which makes it perfect for travel.
customer_reviews.author: BoMan

customer_reviews.title: It is small and works.  Easy to use and put away!
customer_reviews.text: Like portability for home and travel. It packs into small zippered case. The unit has large enough water tank. It would be nice if the head was not permanent. Overall expensive but worthwhile!
customer_reviews.author: James Magsamen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful oral care device.
customer_reviews.text: This small device really works. I use the regular version at home and always missed it while traveling. It’s expensive but, for me, worth every penny. You can set it up and take it down easily.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home and travel
customer_reviews.text: The waterpik sidekick is compact and easily packs in your luggage. It’s really well designed and looks smart on the bathroom sink counter. The size of the reservoir is perfect for cleaning all teeth. The water pressure has variable settings for what ever you are comfortable with. The water nozzle rotates easily for getting to all surfaces of your teeth. I highly recommend the sidekick. Dick Hoagland
customer_reviews.author: richard w. hoagland

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I use this for daily use to replace my old waterpik that broke. It’s so much better looking than their everyday models and I think it works as well. It’s not quite as strong as my old model but I never turned my old one all the way up so that’s fine, it also doesn’t hold as much water but it’s plenty enough water to do your whole mouth.
customer_reviews.author: I'm Me

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this one
customer_reviews.text: I have used waterpik for years ... this is a great idea but it has no Power making it expensive and useless
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Compact yet powerful water flosser
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool compact water flosser. It is well made and i am really happy with it. It cleans very well and there are few pressure levels it let me choose. If it is your first time using water flosser I suggest you not to use the strongest pressure level since it may make you bleed for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Nachumi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: I really like this version of WaterPik. It’s small, convenient, easily portable, and almost as powerful as a full-size unit. The only thing that’s lacking is the temporary bypass button. Nevertheless, I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: The Clean Veganista

customer_reviews.title: In love with it
customer_reviews.text: It sits/fits perfectly on my tiny "crowded" counter and is much better than the battery based handheld version I have. The only prob is there is no hose/tip replacement on Amazon and WaterPik won't sell it outside US/Canada.
customer_reviews.author: R&R

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Waterpik
customer_reviews.text: Our old Waterpik is still working but as soon as I see this one, I know I have to buy it specially when it's on sale. it is elegantly design. This one sits very nicely on our bathroom countertop. Compare with our old one, the power is pretty much the same for us. The sound is quieter than our one. The only complaint we have is the head isn't removable or adjustable like the old one. But we love this one, the size is compact and travel friendly. Now we are able to bring it with us when we travel.
customer_reviews.author: Yenny Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in all ways!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been meaning to write a review since this product is awesome. It’s easy to travel with & the pressure is perfect. It’s elegant to look at and compact, perfect for maintaining dental hygiene while travelling
customer_reviews.author: Erica, fan of this!

customer_reviews.title: This WaterPik is perfect for travelers
customer_reviews.text: This WaterPik is perfect for travelers! It works on 110 and 210 current and the very compact design makes it so easy to tuck it into your suitcase. I am totally satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: bill8931

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Compact and works great. Feels kind of elegant in a hotel room too. Unlike other Waterpik devices this one is internationally compatible for travel voltage changes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Not ugly, simple, and plenty of power.
customer_reviews.text: I’m super happy. Very small, not ugly, and more than enough power. Portability is actually a bonus separate to what I already started. Areas of improvement could be a power button on the stylus, a slightly longer stylus cord.
customer_reviews.author: mjezzi

customer_reviews.title: Great for maintaining healthy gums and teeth
customer_reviews.text: Great product but it can get messy even though using it correctly. Only use over a sink and make sure that your mouth is really closed up when using it. The jet stream of water is pretty powerful and can get messy
customer_reviews.author: Mick

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: A perfect travel companion! Seriously I have tried so many other travel knock offs and they were a joke. This is just like the one I have at home but portable. Total game changer for me.
customer_reviews.author: chari woodrum

customer_reviews.title: Better than my regular Waterpik.
customer_reviews.text: I love this travel Waterpik. I have recently had dental implants and crowns placed and my periodontist recommended it. I travel at least once a month and it is small, compact. Sometimes I keep it out and use it instead of my regular Waterpik when I get home.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted from June to October and now won't turn on!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this until it stopped working this morning. The on off switch is unresponsive. Ordered June 5 stopped working Oct 3. Things it doesn't even get that much use. Only use it the I travel on monthly 4day trips
customer_reviews.author: Pamela B.

customer_reviews.title: At last! The perfect travel WaterPik!
customer_reviews.text: We have used the handheld battery charged products, which are never enough (short battery life short water capacity ). This product gives a hard stream, and just the right amount of water for complete use. This works just as good as our home waterPik. It is perfect for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Doug W

customer_reviews.title: Finally a counter top worthy waterpik
customer_reviews.text: This should be *the* waterpik. Just like the full size one with a more compact and stylish design.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Best little machine ever made
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little machine better than the bigger one very portable I can’t live without it now!! I take it everywhere I need this for my oral health. Using a waterpik for years it heals your gums. I’ve had an abcess and with listening it healed it without going to the dentist. My most favorite thing.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Richman

customer_reviews.title: Way better than flossing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Exactly what I was looking for. The plug is a bit cumbersome, but it is all very portable and a high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Device. Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for travel and home. Enough power to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: John T. Yurkin

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted a year with limited use
customer_reviews.text: Had for about about a year and stopped working . I haven't used it in a while and when i tried to use it., it wasn’t functional anymore
customer_reviews.author: Bryant Wexler

customer_reviews.title: powerful
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is great looking and very powerful!! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: kejuka

customer_reviews.title: Great option for traveling!
customer_reviews.text: It works like my full size one at home except the tank is smaller so I had to fill it 2 or 3 times. It is great to have a small one to travel with!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Your teeth & gums will appreciate this great device !
customer_reviews.text: could't find in various stores in stock so ordered on line, simple fast !
customer_reviews.author: Motown

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite water flosser. It takes up very little counter space and looks modern and sleek in my bathroom. The black is so much more attractive than the bulky white ones. And it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Smart

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully Engineered!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using Waterpick flossers for as long as I can remember as part of regular oral hygiene. This is by far the most well engineered & esthetically pleasing design ever. I LOVE it for both home & travel. Beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: COVID HIGH RISK - SELLING USED PRODUCTS AS NEW
customer_reviews.text: Gross. Purchased NEW flosser and received USED flosser. Really upsetting to open up a used hygienic product that should have been new from Waterpik. Should have bought direct from manufacturers. SERIOUS CONCERNS DURING ONGOING PANDEMIC.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Stop working after awhile
customer_reviews.text: It was great when it worked. I like the fact that I could pack it and travel with it. But the product stopped working completely after about 1.5 years in use. Luckily I registered the product when I purchased it. It's still under warranty so I hope I will get a replacement soon.
customer_reviews.author: ML Le

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 9 months
customer_reviews.text: Loved it but stopped working after 9 months It won’t start and I’m unsure about warranty offered.
customer_reviews.author: Niurka D'Amour

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: design is poor - difficult to remove water sprayer as is too close to the power button. Tip of water sprayer scratches gums and often causes abrasions Lasted only 7 months before power attachment failed (not caused by power source) Water container too small
customer_reviews.author: Kerry M. Connor

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and portable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, very portable, I wish I had gotten this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed and costly
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in May but used for first time this week and after using 3 days it won’t turn on or do anything.
customer_reviews.author: Monica R. Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but good for travel. Quiet. Good flow. The package is luxury like Iphone. Happy so far
customer_reviews.author: Tr N

customer_reviews.title: Sidekick is good
customer_reviews.text: You people keep donating to Black Lives Matter (Burn Loot Murder) (A communist organization) and I will use eBay instead
customer_reviews.author: L. Victor McGough

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel!!
customer_reviews.text: This little gem is the best! Light and easy to use. We have taken traveling and it is so nice to have a Waterpik everywhere we go. It come with a little cover for travel. BUT we use it everyday also at home. I love it love it love it.
customer_reviews.author: MLK

customer_reviews.title: The perfect travel companion
customer_reviews.text: As a frequent traveler, I absolutely love this product! The fact that it runs on anything between 110 and 240 V makes it perfect for worldwide use, just don’t forget your adapter!
customer_reviews.author: tony segura

customer_reviews.title: Portable
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for travel. I have a fixed orthotic.
customer_reviews.author: R D Cave

customer_reviews.title: Effective Waterpik
customer_reviews.text: I brought it to Europe and Las Vegas. It worked beautifully as it adopted to local and international voltage. I’m very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna A.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It’s worth the money. Love that it’s not super loud.
customer_reviews.author: Angela H.

customer_reviews.title: Compact yet powerful water flosser
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use while traveling. Sleek and simple design, yet functions just as well as the full-size waterpik I use at home.
customer_reviews.author: Cm

customer_reviews.title: No lid
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had a lid. It’s strange that they didn’t make them with lids
customer_reviews.author: Candace and Chris and Rachael

customer_reviews.title: For me, the Sidekick Water Flosser does everything I ...
customer_reviews.text: For me, the Sidekick Water Flosser does everything I want it to do. My third Waterpik over years past but the Sidekick is the easiest for traveling. Thank you, Waterpik!
customer_reviews.author: Wendylou

customer_reviews.title: Fully recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It's compact, easy to use and powerful. Fun for travel too. Completely happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Ritch

customer_reviews.title: Best water flosser I've used!
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few water flossers before an actual Waterpik, and I always had at least one uncomfortable issue with them (too painful, messy, tickles, etc.). Not this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: The most powerful water flosser!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best and most powerful irrigator ever!!! Small, lightweight and easy to take on the go.
customer_reviews.author: sandra williamson

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a year, conveniently past the product support deadline
customer_reviews.text: I liked this WaterPik very much, and used it for every day use. However, after one year, it simply stopped working. Silent.
customer_reviews.author: GardenWild

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality Control on packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived without a power supply. Another week for a replacement. Don’t waste your time with this.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Redfield

customer_reviews.title: Update of my review
customer_reviews.text: Please disregard my last review. I found the connector and it works great. Thanks and sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Andres Castellanos

customer_reviews.title: I received used goods.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new product, but received a second hands. It's too impolite to send something that goes into mouth as used goods.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use. Compact
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek and compact. I bought this unit to use at home and be able to take it with me when I travel.
customer_reviews.author: Gaedeniagarden

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, simple to store away for travel, effective cleaning with variable settings.
customer_reviews.author: Janine J.

customer_reviews.title: gum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: it works well and it clean mouth very well and good pressure of water i like it.
customer_reviews.author: Yi Dong

customer_reviews.title: Dentist recommendation that works!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Definitely great for travel. I like the different power settings.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Waterpik
customer_reviews.text: Owned it for about a month and it is working as advertised
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Compact and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the compact size and all of its features work conveniently for me.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Mariano

customer_reviews.title: Quit working!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Water Pik 10 months ago. It was great when I bought it, but now it doesn’t work! So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: You'll feel so clean, even the dental hygienest will envy you!
customer_reviews.text: This product is streamlined, clean shaped, and easily packable. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Groovy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I hated flossing because it always got stuck love this product
customer_reviews.author: Michele U Romaine

customer_reviews.title: Very portable and useful
customer_reviews.text: Very portable for travel. Easy to set up and operate.
customer_reviews.author: steven g.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Item, Super Fast Shipping My teeth is Bright! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s awesome! I have another water pick but not travel size. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very quickly deliver
customer_reviews.text: Very good The waterpik Make good job I loved that
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Initially I was pleased with the function and use of this product
customer_reviews.text: This product was purchased on March 3rd and ceased working right after the return window and service window closed on July 1st. Initially I was pleased with the function and use of this product, but it is disappointing to learn that this product lacks longevity and that the company does not support its patrons in ensuring quality items that serve a purpose for more than a 4 month period.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Lee Hackney

customer_reviews.title: My waterpik died after less than 4 months of use ...
customer_reviews.text: My waterpik died after less than 4 months of use! It stopped turning on. There was no way to tell what was wrong with the unit or what broke.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Messy n Cumbersome!
customer_reviews.text: Very good settings, but the attached cord, to the wand, was very cumbersome to use in addition to water getting all over the place. My advice, get one that's cordless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: small, lightweight and works great
customer_reviews.text: I travel several times a month for work and had been taking my home waterpik with me. large, heavy, but works well. i tried this on the advise of dick debartolo, the giz-wiz, and have been impressed by how such a small compact product can work so well. small, light, and terrifically efficient. highly recommended. thanks, dick
customer_reviews.author: duditos

customer_reviews.title: This is a very beautiful and compact way to travel with a waterpik
customer_reviews.text: This is a very beautiful and compact way to travel with a waterpik. Excellent packaging. I am in love with my new flosser.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Dead on arrival. Delivered same day but doesn’t switch on!
customer_reviews.author: Arun

customer_reviews.title: Low power/poor design
customer_reviews.text: I already have a Waterpik Aquarius. I bought the Sidekick primarily to save counter space. Unfortunately the Sidekick power cord requires about two inches of space at the back of the unit (see photo) so no counter space is saved. In addition, it offers only a fraction of the cleaning power of the Aquarius, which is a superior product on all fronts. The Sidekick may be a good choice if you need a unit for travel
customer_reviews.author: C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Overall Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Smaller, portable size (w/ travel case) so not unsightly & easy to clean -Powerful enough, gets teeth clean -Works better than flossing -Not overly noisy -Rotating head -Easy to operate Cons: -Only allows 1 user -Can't change head so hope it doesn't break, a design flaw -Plug sticks out 2" from side so can't place in corner, a design flaw -Have to lean really low to sink so water doesn't run down arm & onto sleeve, countertop Other: -Smaller tank which I need to fill twice for thorough job, but it's easy to do...no big deal -Close mouth while using & turn off before take out of mouth...easy technique to learn
customer_reviews.author: BnE

customer_reviews.title: Love it, aside from the power cable
customer_reviews.text: The power of this is vastly superior to the other travel Waterpik products, and it is noticeable more quiet than any previous model. The head is fixed in position, and based on reviews I was worried about it, but I honestly don’t miss the versatility. My only complaint is the power cable: it’s still proprietary (versus USB-C), totally different from all the other Waterpik models I’ve had, and juts almost a full two inches out the back instead of being angled (so it doesn’t sit flush against the bathroom counter wall).
customer_reviews.author: Matt Hargett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, but small water tank
customer_reviews.text: Build quality is great. Just wish it had a larger water tank. 60-seconds does not feel like enough time and I wish it had the 90-second tank like others, or at least an option. That's 50% more run time! Still, no regrets in the purchase, looks high-end and modern. Kudos to your ID team.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S. Malone

customer_reviews.title: No more bleeding & sore gums
customer_reviews.text: At five months pregnant my gum started to bleed. My dental hygienist friend diagnosed me over the phone as having pregnancy related gingivitis, she said I needed a deep cleaning but since I can’t make it to the dentist because of COVID-19, at least get a WaterPik . Since using this thing my mouth haven’t bled, and my gums feel better. It’s portability makes it a little awkward to use until you get the hang of it, but I’m pleased with this product as it will be easy to travel with ( when the world opens up again ).
customer_reviews.author: Care15

customer_reviews.title: The Apple Phone of Water Flossers
customer_reviews.text: This is the high end of water flossers. I have granite counters and copper sinks. This fits right in with that look. The size is small enough to fit anywhere. Performance is great. The tool fits in small hands easily. It is pricey if you compare to other water flossers out there, but I was going for performance with the looks. This unit delivers.
customer_reviews.author: Timbo

product_meta.title: Waterpik Sidekick Portable Water Flosser Perfect for Travel & Home, White/Chrome
product_meta.description: Color:White/ChromeFeaturing an ultra-compact and convenient design, The Waterpik Sidekick water Flosser makes it easy to water floss anywhere, anytime. The Waterpik Sidekick is ideal for bathrooms with limited counter space - it collapses easily for storage and fits in almost any purse or briefcase for travel-ready water flossing. It comes with a new easy-to-hold flossing stylus with integrated classic tip and swivel handle for effortless access to all areas of the mouth. The easy and most effective way to Floss, the Waterpik Sidekick delivers all the clinically proven benefits of Waterpik water flossing. It cleans deep between teeth and below the gum line to remove harmful bacteria and debris that traditional brushing and flossing can't reach. And it removes up to 99.9% of plaque from treated areas. It includes a premium storage case, flossing stylus, 13 Ounce (400 ml) water reservoir, slide-in wall-brick with global voltage (100 240VAC, 60/50Hz), and 3-year warranty.
feature_bullets: Ultra-compact, convenient Waterpik Water Flosser: Ideal for travel and limited counter space, includes premium water-resistant storage travel case

Floss anytime, anywhere: As your personal and portable water flosser, Sidekick is easy to use and packs up quickly for storage or travel, plus it is global voltage compatible (100 240VAC, 60/50Hz) for international use
Full-sized performance: Powered by the same patented Waterpik Water Flosser technology used in full-sized, countertop units
Clinically proven: Removes upto 99.9% of plaque from treated areas and helps prevent tooth decay and future dental work

Includes new flossing stylus with integrated classic tip and swivel handle for effortless access to all areas of the mouth, 13-ounce reservoir for 60 seconds of flossing time, assembled measurements 3.9d x 4.8h x 5.7w inches
